item.title: Autoconnect to NetworkManager VPN on systemd based system
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Here is small post with instructions how to setup auto connect to VPN. Of course you can probably figure out all this yourself, but what if you are lazy?
